mapper.select: SELECT num, count, c.coordi_no as coordiNo, c.user_id as userId, m.nickname as nickname, coordi_content as coordiContent, c.gender as gender, season as season, temperature as temperature, reg_date as regdate, hashtag as hashtag, c.DEL_YN as delYN, i.filepath as coordifilepath, g.filepath as profilefilepath, i.top_YN as topYN FROM ( SELECT row_number()over(order by count desc) as num, DATA.* FROM ( SELECT NVL(count,0) AS count ,c.* from coordi c left join (select count(*) AS count,coordi_no from coordi_LIKE group by coordi_no) b on (b.coordi_No=c.coordi_No) ) DATA ) C left join coordi_img i on(c.coordi_no=i.coordi_no) left join member m on (m.user_id=c.user_id) left join member_img g on(m.user_id=g.user_id) WHERE top_yn='Y' and num BETWEEN 1 AND 5
select coordi_no as coordiNo from coordi_like where user_id=#{userId}
select coordi_no as coordiNo from coordi_scrap where user_id=#{userId}

SELECT num, count, c.coordi_no as coordiNo, c.user_id as userId, m.nickname as nickname, coordi_content as coordiContent, c.gender as gender, season as season, temperature as temperature, reg_date as regdate, hashtag as hashtag, c.DEL_YN as delYN, i.filepath as coordifilepath, g.filepath as profilefilepath, i.top_YN as topYN FROM ( SELECT row_number()over(order by count desc) as num, DATA.* FROM ( SELECT NVL(count,0) AS count ,c.* from coordi c left join (select count(*) AS count,coordi_no from coordi_LIKE group by coordi_no) b on (b.coordi_No=c.coordi_No) ) DATA ) C left join coordi_img i on(c.coordi_no=i.coordi_no) left join member m on (m.user_id=c.user_id) left join member_img g on(m.user_id=g.user_id) WHERE top_yn='Y' and (num BETWEEN 1 AND 5) and (reg_date between (to_char(sysdate-7,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')))
